Create a virtual reality experience that simulates the life of a homeless person to raise awareness and empathy among the general public.
Develop a mobile app that connects homeless individuals with local resources such as food banks, shelters, and job training programs.
Design a modular, portable housing unit that can be easily assembled and disassembled to accommodate the changing needs of homeless individuals and families.

Create a community land trust that provides affordable housing options for low-income individuals and families, while also addressing the root causes of homelessness through job training and education programs.
Develop a gamified system that incentivizes individuals and organizations to contribute to homelessness initiatives through donations, volunteering, or advocacy.
